scripts.start:all: cd ./tools && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.all.yml -f docker-compose.http.yml up --build -d
scripts.stop: cd ./tools && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.all.yml -f docker-compose.http.yml -f docker-compose.https.yml down
scripts.deploy: cd ./tools && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.all.yml -f docker-compose.https.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.all.yml -f docker-compose.https.yml push
